message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $12,000.  What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $9,000 for it. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I appreciate you seeing the value in this product.  While I'm not able to meet you at $9,000, I could be flexible. How about we settle at $11,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am still unable to pay more than $9,000 for the product. Could you consider reducing the price to meet my budget?
